member.name: T:Windows.Media.Playlists.Playlist
member.summary: Provides access to a media playlist.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Playlists.Playlist.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a Playlist object.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Playlists.Playlist.Files
member.summary: The set of media files that make up the playlist.
member.returns: The list of media files that make up the playlist.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Playlists.Playlist.LoadAsync(Windows.Storage.IStorageFile)
member.summary: Asynchronously loads files into a playlist.
member.returns: Represents the asynchronous operation for loading the playlist. The GetResults method of this IAsyncOperation object returns the playlist.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Playlists.Playlist.SaveAsAsync(Windows.Storage.IStorageFolder,System.String,Windows.Storage.NameCollisionOption)
member.summary: Asynchronously saves the playlist to a specified file and folder.
member.param: The folder in which to save the playlist.
The name of the playlist to save.
The action to take if the playlist is saved to an existing file. One of the values of the NameCollisionOption enumeration.
member.returns: Represents the asynchronous operation to save the playlist to a specified file and folder.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Playlists.Playlist.SaveAsAsync(Windows.Storage.IStorageFolder,System.String,Windows.Storage.NameCollisionOption,Windows.Media.Playlists.PlaylistFormat)
member.summary: Asynchronously saves the playlist to a specified file and folder, in a specified format.
member.param: The folder in which to save the playlist.
The name of the playlist to save.
The action to take if the playlist is saved to an existing file. One of the values of the NameCollisionOption enumeration.
The playlist format. One of the values of the PlaylistFormat enumeration.
member.returns: Represents the asynchronous operation to save the playlist to a specified file and folder.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Playlists.Playlist.SaveAsync
member.returns: Represents the asynchronous action to save the playlist.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Playlists.PlaylistFormat
member.summary: Indicates the format of a playlist file.
